section.name: settings
section.item:
Lakberendezés,
enterior Design

texts.pageText:
My name is Ildikó Tölts. I graduated as an interior decorator from the famous school of Junior Art.
I´d already had several work references before I started school. Creating a harmonious surrounding is a very important part of my everyday life. I find it very important to pay special attention to ourselves in all aspects of our lives even through our living spaces for we may feel good only in an environment reflecting our real self. This purpose should permeate all segments of our lives.
If we let ourselves drifting by today’s way of market-oriented and impersonal attitude, which busts from the structure of today´s society obeying mass norms, our life will flatter monotony with cheerlessness and unbalance and we won´t have much bright moments.
I consider interior planning important because with the help of it we can step out more valiantly onto the bullring of life,

“....The only real luxury is style which anybody can afford independent from amount of money they have. This is the kind of thing that was born with us but it can be learnt supposing one has the proper intelligence for it.... ” /Giorgio Armani/

• Maecenas porttitor commodo massa.
 • Proin viverra odio ac dolor.
 • Proin gravida urna vel dui.
 • Proin ac magna non libero suscipit
 • Sed vehicula nibh quis justo.

 • Duis suscipit elit vel tortor.

• Maecenas porttitor commodo massa.

fusce feugiat malesuada odio. morbi nunc di gravida at, cursus nec, luctus a, lorem aeceas tristique orci ac sem. duis ultricies pharetra magna. donec accumsan malesuad.

arming ourselves with safety, which can only come from the beauty and harmony of our environment.
An interior designer´s or interior decorator´s main task is to notice, to show and furthermore to create the customer´s inner world through his living space, independent from the chosen style being eclectic, minimal art, high-tech, postmodern or any other given style.

A good interior plan is not about using common rules that increase only stiffness in our lives but breaking those rules by giving space to the individual´s boundlessness for him to be able to live a more qualitative, more full life by opening the door of our inside world for our inner spark to be able to break through the dullness of everyday life and the feeling of having being forced to be similar to the rest of the world surrounding us.

My mission is to be committed to my work and through it to people for the success of a creative work is not measured by what the person actually did, but how much his creation could improve and enrich the customer´s world by following affection and obedience living in him.

And if an interior designed well can give peace of mind, the feel of intimacy and a little joy for the customer, it was well worth all the effort. Because showing ourselves to the outside world even if with some professional help is a big enough task for the most of us. It takes courage but to be courageous in hope for a better life does worth it all...

texts.pageText: <font face="Georgia">We undertake the inner planning of flats ,houses,hotels,restaurants,and clubs.</font>
We undertake the organizing of the implementation and the transaction it in addition to these services.

- participation in the shopping
- plan modification after the already accepted variant
- budgetary publication
- furniture planning
- decoration making


Pricing
 Based on the prices defined in the price list of LOSZ.

23.07.2008
